titles.title: Alas, and did my Savior bleed

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}At the cross, at the cross where I first saw the light, And the burden of my heart rolled away, It was there by faith I received my sight, And now I am happy all the day!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Alas, and did my Savior bleed? And did my Sovereign die? Would He devote that sacred head For such a worm as I?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Was it for sins that I had done He groaned upon the tree? Amazing pity! grace unknown! And love beyond degree!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Well might the sun in darkness hide, And shut His glories in, When Christ, the mighty Maker, died For man, His creature’s sin.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thus might I hide my blushing face While His dear cross appears. Dissolve my heart in thankfulness, And melt mine eyes to tears.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
